Posts.Content: Hi Hutch, listen, please do not panick. Liver secondaries can be managed very well. I have had liver secondaries for over three years and they are stable. I wish you luck with your appointment! Indie xx
Posts.Title: liver secondaries

Posts.Content: Hi Carol, that is fantastic news, I wish you well through chemo and the remainder of your treatment! All the best Indie xx
Posts.Title: good news at last
